mean_cn: n. 经纪人，掮客；  v. 作为经纪人进行谈判，以中间人等身份安排
mean_en: a person who buys and sells things for other people; a person who helps to arrange the details of an agreement between two opposing groups or countries
sentence: The real estate broker is showing the young couple a house.
sentence_trans: 这位房地产经纪人正给这对年轻夫妇介绍一座房子。
